data.text: Kate Davis is an American director, producer and editor. She is best known for Southern Comfort, and Traffic Stop for which she received Academy Award for Best Documentary Short Subject nomination with husband David Heilbroner at the 90th Academy Awards. Kateâ€™s documentary Southern Comfort, a 2001 Sundance Film Festival Grand Prize winner, has won over 25 awards and continues to be screened as a seminal work aimed towards overcoming transphobia.
